aws_datasync_location_nfs.description: Manages an AWS DataSync NFS Location

on_prem_config.description: Configuration block containing information for connecting to the NFS File System.

server_hostname.description: Specifies the IP address or DNS name of the NFS server. The DataSync Agent(s

subdirectory.description: Subdirectory to perform actions as source or destination. Should be exported by the NFS server.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location.
